mapper.insert: insert into weizu_oa_sign_record( employee_id, team_id, latitude, longitude, location_info, sign_type, sign_result, sign_time, create_time ) values ( #{employeeId}, #{teamId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{locationInfo}, #{signType}, #{signResult}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update weizu_oa_sign_record set modify_time=now(), latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, location_info = #{locationInfo}, sign_type = #{signType}, sign_result = #{signResult} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.employee_id as employeeId, t.team_id as teamId, t.latitude as latitude, t.longitude as longitude, t.location_info as locationInfo, t.sign_type as signType, t.sign_result as signResult, t.sign_time as signTime, t.create_time as createTime from weizu_oa_sign_record as t where id = #{id}
